        public void onUpgrade(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase sqLiteDatabase,
                      int i,
                      int i1)
        Called when the database needs to be upgraded. This will drop the database and create a new one. The data from the previous one will move forward into the new db
        Overrides:
        onUpgrade in class DBHelper
        Parameters:
        sqLiteDatabase - The database.
        i - The old database version.
        i1 - The new database version.
